title: Game Crash Error Code 0xc0000005
body: I'm having trouble loading league after champ select. I have uninstalled and reinstalled league, checked my Direct-X driver and updated my graphics card. I was just playing league the previous night. If you have any tips or advice please comment below. Thank you

replies.body:
Hey Chronic Bud,

We've noticed players running AVG are seeing this error after the new patch. Making sure League of Legends is allowed as an Exception through your Firewall should resolve this issue. Here's a [guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) that can show you how to allow League to your Exceptions list. 

If this doesn't resolve your issue, go ahead and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our Techs can help troubleshoot this issue.

Thanks!

for AVG, go to options>advanced settings>exceptions
Add exception>exception type: folder> [your riot games folder]
Yeah, this happened to me a couple of days ago. Try disabling AVG.
